remarks: A consequence of relative atomicity.  Extensionality principle: two lattice elements are equal iff they majorize the same atoms. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
chrelat3.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
chrelat3.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
chrelat4i $p |- ( A = B <-> A. x e. HAtoms ( x C_ A <-> x C_ B ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
